item.description:
This was a nice spot for networking for another group I organize events for. I wanted to do it for this group as well. Everytime I've been here, it's been a great time. So let's meet up and wrap up the week with some drinks and conversation!

Let's plan to meet up in the lower level.

Also, for those night owls & music lovers like myself, I plan to head over afterward (~10/10:30pm, their show actually starts at 9:30pm, but they go late up until 1am) to the Lizard Lounge in Cambridge (1667 Mass Ave.) to check out one of my favorite local bands: Dub Apocalypse. They use a foundation of reggae dub basslines, and do jazz improvisation on top of them. Every time I see them, they bring out that "nasty face" LOL. They do push the envelope musically also. If anyone is interested they can join me there as well.

More info on Dub Apocalypse: http://www.reverbnation.com/dubapocalypse

Lizard Lounge Calendar: http://lizardloungeclub.com/calendar/
item.name: Networking at Back Bay Social Club
